EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners - only in US (1342553910.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners - only in US (1342553910.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Walter, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. At this time we only work with consultants who are based out of the United States. If anything changes we most certinly will reach out. We appreicate your efforts to connect and wish you the best. Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 2:51 PM To: 'wmei@mip.polimi.it' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Walter, Thank you for requesting more information from MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you about our services, if you prefer you can book a time to chat using my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFxcvGd74uzXMqbhljjJNJG80dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. As a courtesy, I’ll also be reaching out to you through the number you provided. Below you’ll find the links to information you requested: - You’re copy of the consulting rate guide is broken out into three calculation methods which are hyperlinked from our table of contents which you can access by clicking here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-bill-rate-resource-guide.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFxcvGd74uzXMqbhljjJNJG80dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Short 2 minute video <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFxcvGd74uzXMqbhljjJNJG80dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> on MBO. Look forward to speaking with you soon, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFxcvGd74uzXMqbhljjJNJG80dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFxcvGd74uzXMqbhljjJNJG80dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFxcvGd74uzXMqbhljjJNJG80dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
